reviewText: This is a great movie though I wish it would come out on DVD.  Beverly D'Angelo is an exceptional actress who proves she can play the bad girl just as good if not better than anyone else.  I love her in the "Vacation" films with Chevy Chase, but this is a different kind of role for the talented, beautiful actress.  She's quite the femme fatale and with her looks and charm, it's easy to see why a man can't say no to her or resist her!  She seems so nice and sweet, too!  Oh, well.  She's definitely not nice and sweet here.  It's fascinating to watch her character manipulate and charm her way into marriage to a wealthy, very attractive widower with a handsome, musically talented, college-aged son (Patty Duke's son) who isn't so easily manipulated or charmed.
Interesting, cat and mouse type of mystery between the step son and step mother. Reasonable clean movie. Good movie to watch. Remj

OMG! there is an extra (actress) in the Frat scene that is to die for. She is so freakin HOT!!!! She has black shor t hair and looks around 19 years old. OMG I want to marry this girl!!!!!!!! I have to find her! I can/t live with out her..... I wan't to sleep next to her for ever.....
VHS tape was ordered 7/6, but did not arrive until 8/5.  The expected upper limit on delivery was 8 days earlier.

Bev D'Angelo, a favorite of mine for a long time, is at her HOTTEST when she seduces a rich man for his money.  After the man's death she expects to inherit the fortune, she discovers the fortune has been bequeathed to her  step son. Her seductive voice, luscious body and sweet but sexy personality  makes this film a must have for any Bev fan.  My only complaint was there  was only one nude scene and it was brief. Also too much time is spent  following around the son when it could have been following Bev around in  sexy outfits.
